original_text: Saul's son, Ish-Bosheth, was 40 years old when he became king over Israel. He ruled Israel for two years. But Judah's people were faithful to David as their king.
korean_text: 사울의 아들 이스보셋이 이스라엘 왕이 될 때에 나이가 사십 세이며 두 해 동안 왕위에 있으니라 유다 족속은 다윗을 따르니

sentences.original_text: Saul's son, Ish-Bosheth, was 40 years old
when he became king over Israel
He ruled Israel for two years
But Judah's people were faithful to David
